title: The Mist | American Horror Story Season 6 PROMO #7
author: AHS WORLD
comment: It´s so random, it makes me think the next season will be about hollywood/cinema or something. Aliens in one promo, a monster from the lake, a vampire in a staircase...
Such a shame they decided to go with this theme for the season...
Okay this season is about Demons are paranormal activity.
description: Run.
